/* Note: do not edit this file use tailwind to add styles */

* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

html, body {
    height: 100%;
}

body {
    font-family: 'Plus Jakarta Sans', sans-serif;
    height: 100vh;
}

/* -------------- CONTAINER -------------- */
.container  {
    display: flex;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    position: relative;
}

/* -------------- SIDEBAR -------------- */
.sidebar {
    width: 240px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    justify-content: space-between;
    border-right: 1px solid #F3F5F7;
    padding: 0 16px;
    overflow: auto;
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    background-color: white;
    z-index: 50;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.sidebar__logo {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    margin: 40px 0 56px -30px;
}

.sidebar__logo-header {
    margin-left: 14px;
}

.side-nav {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}

.side-nav__header {
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 21px;
    color: #90A3BF;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    display: inline-block;
}

.side-nav__header, .side-nav__item > svg {
    letter-spacing: -2%;
    font-weight: 500;
}

.side-nav__item {
    list-style: none;
    color: #596780;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 14px;
    padding: 14px 0 14px 16px;    
    border-radius: 10px;
    transition: all .4s;
    cursor: pointer;
    white-space: nowrap;
    margin-top: 10px;
}

.side-nav__item > svg {
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.side-nav__item.last-item {
    margin-bottom: 32px;
}

.side-nav__item:not(:last-child) {
    margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.side-nav__item:hover,  .side-nav__item-active {
    background-color: #DC4654;
    color: white;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

    .sidebar {
        transform: translateX(0);
    }

        transform: translateX(-100%);
    }
    
    .main-content {
        margin-left: 0 !important;
    }
}

}

        flex-direction: column;

    }

        font-size: 18px;
    }

		display: block; 
	}

    tr > th {
        position: absolute;
		top: -9999px;
		left: -9999px;
    }

    td { 
		/* Behave  like a "row" */
		border: none;
		border-bottom: 1px solid #F3F5F7; 
		position: relative;
		padding-left: 50%; 
	}

    td::before {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
    }

    tr > td {
        text-align: end;
    }

    tr > td:first-child {
        justify-content: end;
    }

    td:nth-of-type(1):before { content: "Transactions"; }
    td:nth-of-type(2):before { content: "Date"; }
    td:nth-of-type(3):before { content: "Amount"; }
    td:nth-of-type(4):before { content: "Status"; }

        font-size: 14px;
    }

    .pie-chart__labels-item {
        font-size: 16px;
    }
}

    }

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
        {% block metaTags %}
            <title>
                {% block title %}
                    {% env 'PROJECT_NAME' %}'s Dashboard | OWASP-BLT
                {% endblock title %}
            </title>
            <meta name="description"
                  content="{% block description %}Seamlessly manage bug bounties, track vulnerabilities, and fortify your digital assets with {% env 'PROJECT_NAME' %}'s comprehensive platform. Empower your security team and engage researchers effectively.{% endblock description %}" />
            <meta name="keywords"
                  content="{% block keywords %}{% env 'PROJECT_NAME' %}, bug bounty, vulnerability management, security platform, ethical hacking, cyber security, bug tracking, vulnerability, OWASP, application security{% endblock keywords %}" />
            <!-- Open Graph Meta Tags for Social Sharing -->
            <meta property="og:title"
                  content="{% block og_title %} {% env 'PROJECT_NAME' %} | Your Hub for Secure Bug Bounty & Vulnerability Programs{% endblock og_title %}" />
            <meta property="og:image"
                  content="{% block og_image_url %}{% static 'organization/img/og_image_default.png' %}{% endblock og_image_url %}" />
            <meta property="og:description"
                  content="{% block og_description %}Launch, manage, and scale your bug bounty programs with ease. {% env 'PROJECT_NAME' %} provides robust tools for submission, tracking, and remediation, ensuring your applications stay secure. Join the vanguard of cybersecurity.{% endblock og_description %}" />
            <meta property="og:type" content="website" />
        {% endblock metaTags %}
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
        <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
        <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
        <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@200;300;400;500;600;700;800&display=swap"
              rel="stylesheet">
        {% comment %} <link rel="stylesheet" href="{% static 'organization/css/style.css' %}"> {% endcomment %}
        <link rel="stylesheet"
              href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.1.2/css/all.min.css"
              integrity="sha512-1sCRPdkRXhBV2PBLUdRb4tMg1w2YPf37qatUFeS7zlBy7jJI8Lf4VHwWfZZfpXtYSLy85pkm9GaYVYMfw5BC1A=="
              crossorigin="anonymous"
              referrerpolicy="no-referrer" />
        <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
        <script src="https://js.sentry-cdn.com/532cda3e6a57beb6fc3aab9fc0500214.min.js"
                crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    </head>
    <body>
        <div class="mt-[75px]">
            {% include "includes/header.html" %}
            {% include "includes/sidenav.html" %}
            <main class="w-full ">
                {% block body %}
                {% endblock body %}
            </main>
        </div>
    </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
    <head>
        <meta charset="UTF-8">
        <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
        {% block metaTags %}
            <title>
                {% block title %}
                    {% env 'PROJECT_NAME' %} Dashboard
                {% endblock title %}
            </title>
            <meta name="description"
                  content="{% block description %}{% env 'PROJECT_NAME' %} make organization bug tracking easy{% endblock description %}">
            <meta name="keywords"
                  content="{% block keywords %}{% env 'PROJECT_NAME' %}, bug, tracking, organization, easy{% endblock keywords %}">
            <!-- Author Meta Tag -->
            <meta name="author" content="">
            <!-- Open Graph Meta Tags -->
            <meta property="og:title"
                  content="{% block og_title %} {% env 'PROJECT_NAME' %} organization Dashboard{% endblock og_title %}" />
            <meta property="og:image" content="" />
            <meta property="og:description"
                  content="{% block og_description %} Create and manage your own Bug Bounty contest with ease! Add enticing prizes, specify the domain and timeline, and upload essential assets like logos and banners. Start your competition today and engage participants with a well-organized, detailed setup. {% endblock og_description %}" />
            <meta property="og:type" content="website" />
        {% endblock metaTags %}
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
        <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
        <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
        <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@200;300;400;500;600;700;800&display=swap"
              rel="stylesheet">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="{% static 'organization/css/style.css' %}">
        <link rel="stylesheet"
              href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.1.2/css/all.min.css"
              integrity="sha512-1sCRPdkRXhBV2PBLUdRb4tMg1w2YPf37qatUFeS7zlBy7jJI8Lf4VHwWfZZfpXtYSLy85pkm9GaYVYMfw5BC1A=="
              crossorigin="anonymous"
              referrerpolicy="no-referrer" />
        <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
        <script src="https://js.sentry-cdn.com/532cda3e6a57beb6fc3aab9fc0500214.min.js"
                crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
        {% block tags %}
        {% endblock tags %}
    </head>
    <body>
        <div class="fixed bottom-2.5 right-3.75">
            <a href="https://github.com/OWASP-BLT/BLT/blob/main/website/templates/organization/organization_dashboard_base.html">
                <i class="fab fa-github"></i>
            </a>
            <a href="https://www.figma.com/file/s0xuxeU6O2guoWEfA9OElZ/Design?node-id=3%3A76&t=pqxWpF3hcYxjEDrs-1">
                <i class="fab fa-figma"></i>
            </a>
        </div>
        <div class="container max-w-full min-w-full">
            {% include "organization/organization_includes/sidebar.html" %}
            <main class="main-content w-[100vw]">
                {% block body %}
                {% endblock body %}
                {% if messages %}
                    {% for message in messages %}
                        {% if message.level_tag == 'error' %}
                            <div id="alert-border-2"
                                 class="popup-errors flex p-4 mb-4 w-[30vw] text-red-800 border-t-4 border-red-300 bg-red-50 absolute bottom-10 right-10"
                                 role="alert">
                                <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5"
                                     fill="currentColor"
                                     viewBox="0 0 20 20"
                                     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                                    <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M18 10a8 8 0 11-16 0 8 8 0 0116 0zm-7-4a1 1 0 11-2 0 1 1 0 012 0zM9 9a1 1 0 000 2v3a1 1 0 001 1h1a1 1 0 100-2v-3a1 1 0 00-1-1H9z" clip-rule="evenodd">
                                    </path>
                                </svg>
                                <div class="ml-3 text-sm font-medium">{{ message }}</div>
                                <button type="button"
                                        onclick="removeErrors()"
                                        class="ml-auto -mx-1.5 -my-1.5 bg-red-50 text-red-500 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-red-400 p-1.5 hover:bg-red-200 inline-flex h-8 w-8"
                                        data-dismiss-target="#alert-border-2"
                                        aria-label="Close">
                                    <span class="sr-only">Dismiss</span>
                                    <svg aria-hidden="true"
                                         class="w-5 h-5"
                                         fill="currentColor"
                                         viewBox="0 0 20 20"
                                         xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                                        <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4.293 4.293a1 1 0 011.414 0L10 8.586l4.293-4.293a1 1 0 111.414 1.414L11.414 10l4.293 4.293a1 1 0 01-1.414 1.414L10 11.414l-4.293 4.293a1 1 0 01-1.414-1.414L8.586 10 4.293 5.707a1 1 0 010-1.414z" clip-rule="evenodd">
                                        </path>
                                    </svg>
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        {% else %}
                            <div id="alert-border-2"
                                 class="popup-errors flex p-4 mb-4 w-[30vw] text-green-800 border-t-4 border-green-300 bg-green-50 absolute bottom-10 right-10"
                                 role="alert">
                                <svg class="flex-shrink-0 w-5 h-5"
                                     fill="currentColor"
                                     viewBox="0 0 20 20"
                                     xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                                    <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M18 10a8 8 0 11-16 0 8 8 0 0116 0zm-7-4a1 1 0 11-2 0 1 1 0 012 0zM9 9a1 1 0 000 2v3a1 1 0 001 1h1a1 1 0 100-2v-3a1 1 0 00-1-1H9z" clip-rule="evenodd">
                                    </path>
                                </svg>
                                <div class="ml-3 text-sm font-medium">{{ message }}</div>
                                <button type="button"
                                        onclick="removeErrors()"
                                        class="ml-auto -mx-1.5 -my-1.5 bg-green-50 text-green-500 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-400 p-1.5 hover:bg-green-200 inline-flex h-8 w-8"
                                        data-dismiss-target="#alert-border-2"
                                        aria-label="Close">
                                    <span class="sr-only">Dismiss</span>
                                    <svg aria-hidden="true"
                                         class="w-5 h-5"
                                         fill="currentColor"
                                         viewBox="0 0 20 20"
                                         xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                                        <path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4.293 4.293a1 1 0 011.414 0L10 8.586l4.293-4.293a1 1 0 111.414 1.414L11.414 10l4.293 4.293a1 1 0 01-1.414 1.414L10 11.414l-4.293 4.293a1 1 0 01-1.414-1.414L8.586 10 4.293 5.707a1 1 0 010-1.414z" clip-rule="evenodd">
                                        </path>
                                    </svg>
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        {% endif %}
                    {% endfor %}
                {% endif %}
            </main>
        </div>
    </body>
    {% block js %}
    {% endblock js %}
    <script>
    function removeErrors(){
        var errors = document.getElementsByClassName('popup-errors');
        var errorsArray = Array.from(errors);

        // Remove each element from the DOM
        errorsArray.forEach(function(error) {
            error.remove();
        });
    }

    </script>
</html>

Removed: website/templates/organization/organization_includes/sidebar.html

    <!-- Toggle Button for Mobile -->
    <button id="sidebarToggle"
            class="lg:hidden fixed top-4 right-4 z-50 bg-white p-2 rounded-md shadow-md">
        <i class="fas fa-bars"></i>
    </button>
    <div class="flex flex-col h-full">

            <div class="w-12 h-12 rounded-full border-[1px] border-gray-500 flex items-center justify-center">

                     class="object-fill rounded-full"

            </div>

                    <span>Bug Bounties</span>
                </li>
            </a>
            <a href="{% url 'organization_manage_roles' organization %}">
                <li data-route="roles" class="side-nav__item">
                    <i class="fa-solid fa-network-wired fa-lg"></i>
                    <span>Roles</span>
                </li>
            </a>
            <a href="{% url 'organization_manage_integrations' organization %}">
                <li data-route="integrations" class="side-nav__item">
                    <i class="fa fa-cog" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                    <span>Integrations</span>
                </li>
            </a>
        </ul>
        <!-- Bottom Navigation -->
        <div class="mt-auto mb-4">
            <a href="{% url 'home' %}" class="side-nav__item flex items-center">
                <i class="fa fa-home" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                <span>Home</span>
            </a>
        </div>
    </div>
</nav>
{% block js %}
    <script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Get the current route
    let path = window.location.pathname;
    let routeParts = path.split("/");
    let routeName = routeParts[3] || 'home';

    // Find and activate the current route
    let navItems = document.querySelectorAll('.side-nav__item');
    navItems.forEach(item => {
        if (item.dataset.route === routeName) {
            item.classList.add('side-nav__item-active');
        }
    });

    // Toggle sidebar on mobile
    const sidebar = document.getElementById('sidebar');
    const toggleBtn = document.getElementById('sidebarToggle');
    
    // Only proceed if both elements exist
    if (sidebar && toggleBtn) {
        // Check if sidebar state is stored
        const sidebarVisible = localStorage.getItem('sidebarVisible') !== 'false';
        if (!sidebarVisible) {
            sidebar.classList.add('translate-x-[-100%]');
        }

        toggleBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
            sidebar.classList.toggle('translate-x-[-100%]');
            const isVisible = !sidebar.classList.contains('translate-x-[-100%]');
            localStorage.setItem('sidebarVisible', isVisible);
        });

        // Close sidebar when clicking outside on mobile
        document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
            const isMobile = window.innerWidth < 1024;
            if (isMobile && !sidebar.contains(event.target) && !toggleBtn.contains(event.target)) {
                sidebar.classList.add('translate-x-[-100%]');
                localStorage.setItem('sidebarVisible', false);
            }
        });
    }
});
    </script>
{% endblock js %}
